comment.author: 24101413@N03
comment._content: I believe this photo was taken at Arlanda, not Bromma. The background matches photos taken at ARN, such as this one: www.airliners.net/photo/Finnair/Sud-SE-210-Caravelle/0086... In any case the aircraft is a DC-8 and I doubt that this large jet type would have been able to safely operate from the short runway at Bromma.

comment._content: Crikey, umbrellas for passengers - you would not see that nowadays...
